name: ai-sdk-ui
description: Frontend React hooks for AI-powered chat interfaces, completions, and streaming UIs with Vercel AI SDK v5. Includes useChat, useCompletion, and useObject hooks for building interactive AI applications. Use when: building React chat interfaces, implementing AI completions in UI, streaming AI responses to frontend, handling chat message state, building Next.js AI apps, managing file attachments with AI, or encountering errors like useChat failed to parse stream, useChat no response, unclosed strea
